basics.name: Zhen Jin
basics.label: PhD student
basics.summary: A Chinese girl passionate about computer systems and technology, with a love for sports and an active lifestyle.

location.address: Yuqian Road, Xihu District, Zhejiang University

work.name: Alibaba Cloud, Hangzhou, Zhejiang
work.summary: Participated in explore NVMe storage virtualization solutions and DPU offloading architecture for object storage in DL scenario
highlights: The research results NVMePass and OS2G were accepted by HPCA 25 and ASPLOS 25, respectively.

volunteer.summary: Served as a volunteer at the university library, responsible for organizing and archiving books, and supporting daily library operations.
highlights: Recognized as an 'Outstanding Volunteer' by the Library of Northwestern Polytechnical University for dedication and service.

volunteer.organization: Spark Volunteer Association, Northwestern Polytechnical University
volunteer.summary: Taught mathematics to rural children during a two-week teaching support program organized by the Spark Environmental Volunteer Association.
highlights: Designed and delivered math lessons to primary school students in a remote village.
Contributed to promoting education equity and rural development through hands-on volunteer teaching.

volunteer.organization: School of Science, Northwestern Polytechnical University
volunteer.summary: Volunteered weekly at Tian'ai Rehabilitation Center for children with intellectual disabilities, providing companionship and emotional support through play-based activities.
highlights: Spent every Wednesday evening interacting with children, helping to create a warm and engaging environment.
Developed patience and empathy through consistent support for children with special needs.

awards.title: National Scholarship
awards.awarder: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China
awards.summary: Awarded the National Scholarship in recognition of outstanding academic performance and comprehensive excellence during undergraduate study.
